text: Samuel Weiler "Sam" Witwer IV (born October 20, 1977) is an American actor and musician. He has appeared in individual episodes of many television shows as well as minor recurring characters in shows including Battlestar Galactica. == Filmography == === Movies === * Gamer (2009) * Pathology (2008) * The Mist (2007) === Television === * 2001: ER – Tommy (1 episode) * 2001–2003: JAG – Beasley (3 episodes) * 2002: Dark Angel – Marrow (1 episode) * 2004: Cold Case – James Creighton (1 episode) * 2004–2005: Battlestar Galactica – Lt. Crashdown (11 episodes) * 2006: Dexter – Neil Perry (3 episodes) * 2007: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia – Muscular Man * 2007–2008: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation – Officer Casella (3 episodes) * 2008–2009: Smallville – Davis Bloome * 2010: The Walking Dead – Zombie soldier inside the tank * 2011–present: Being Human – Aidan McCollin * 2011–2013: Star Wars: The Clone Wars – Darth Maul === Video games === * 2008: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed – Galen Marek, Darth Sidious * 2010: Star Wars: The Forde Unleashed II – Galen Marek, Darth Sidious == References == Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Illinois Category:American voice actors
title: Samuel Witwer
